SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.tcp

Class TCPClient

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.tcp.TCPClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
ServerInterface, Runnable, Remote
public class TCPClient extends Object implements Runnable, ServerInterface
This class is a Runnable that is meant to handle incoming and outgoing messages for a TCP client. This class also handles the ping routine to check that the connection with the server is still active.

  • Constructor Details

    • TCPClient

      public TCPClient(String address, int port, ViewInterface view) throws IOException
      Creates a new TCP client. The client will try to connect to the server at the given address using the given port.
      Parameters:
      address - The address of the server.
      port - The port of the server.
      view - This client's view.
      Throws:
      IOException - Thrown if an error occurs when establishing the connection to the server.

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      This method is the main loop of the client. It reads messages from the server and calls the appropriate methods on the view.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • checkConnectionRoutine

      private void checkConnectionRoutine()
      This method starts a routine that checks if the server has pinged in the last 15 seconds. If it hasn't, the connection is considered lost and the client is stopped.

    • sendTCPMessage

      private void sendTCPMessage(TCPMessage tcpMessage)
      This method sends a message to the server.
      Parameters:
      tcpMessage - the message to be sent.

      Description copied from interface: ServerInterface
      Lets the player leave the game, disconnecting them.
      Specified by:
      leaveGame in interface ServerInterface
      Parameters:
      ignored - false if the client decided spontaneously to leave; true if the client is leaving because the server told it to do so.
